3: —Venus Splash Park underground construction center.
——WARNING, WARNING——
—Structural damage to multiple supporting columns within the park—
—Damage report pending. Unauthorized personnel are advised to stay in place and wait for the help of security personnel—
Blah-blah-blah-blah-blah... Can this stupid broadcast just shut up already?! I ******** know there's been explosions!
Camu mutters while splitting apart a beam with his greatsword. He then climbs on the beam, and repeats this process to climb upward.
****** hell! Can't even tell where's where now. Guess I'll just head up!
A while later...
Liv shakes her head wordlessly at you.
He's still in a signal blind spot, huh...?
...Not that there's much else we can do.
After what feels like an eternity, Camu finally reaches the top level of the pump room.
A 'pump room,' but the sight Camu sees is decidedly... inhuman in design.
Strange growths meld and link with others in incomprehensible ways. Only the squirming red electric currents, faintly visible on the abnormal euclidean dimensions, hint at its history as a pump room.
What could the pumps be transporting? The answer might be better left unanswered.
Camu knows better than to delve into it. He is merely trying to find a miracle hatch that could lead him to the surface.
Oh. There's a hatch...
In the overhanging structure ahead lies a hatch.
With a hatch above ground, a corresponding one below should also exist—that must be the logic that the auto-building system operates on.
...The only issue, is that the hatch is covered in an excess of ashen lock marks, and even the hinges are infested with strange viral growths.
...The hatch remains shut.
Camu slams his greatsword in a fury, attempting to destroy the hatch, but it budges not even a little—evidently not something easily broken at his normal output.
But if Camu tries to increase his power output... His lack of a mind link with a commandant will likely...
But... the surface is close. Perhaps...?
Tch...
Camu decides to try his luck and activates his communications link.
